org.hps.record.svt

Class SvtEvioUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.svt.SvtEvioUtils

  • public class SvtEvioUtils
extends Object
    A set of static utility methods used to decode SVT data.

    • Method Detail

      • getFpgaID

        public static int getFpgaID(int[] data)
        Extract and return the FPGA ID associated with the samples. Note: This method should only be used when looking at test run data.
        Parameters:
        data - - sample block of data
        Returns:
        An FPGA ID in the range 0-7

      • getHybridID

        public static int getHybridID(int[] data)
        Extract and return the hybrid ID associated with the samples Note: This method should only be used when looking at test run data.
        Parameters:
        data - : sample block of data
        Returns:
        A hybrid number in the range 0-2

        Returns:
        A channel number in the range 0-127

      • getSample

        public static int getSample(int sampleN,
                            int[] data)
        Extract and return the nth SVT sample.
        Parameters:
        sampleN - : The sample number of interest. Valid values are 0 to 5
        data - : sample block of data
        Returns:
        ADC value of the nth sample
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the sample number is out of range

        Parameters:

        data - : a multisample header
        Returns:
        address of the nth apv
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the apv address number is out of range

        Parameters:
        sampleN - : The apv read error of interest. Valid values are 0 to 5.
        data - : a multisample header
        Returns:
        read error of the nth apv
        Throws:
        RuntimeException - if the apv number is out of range

      • getROCBanks

        public static List<org.jlab.coda.jevio.BaseStructure> getROCBanks(org.jlab.coda.jevio.BaseStructure evioEvent,
                                                                  int minROCTag,
                                                                  int maxROCTag)
        Retrieve all the banks in an event that match the given tag in their header and are not data banks.
        Parameters:
        evioEvent - : The event/bank being queried
        tag - : The tag to match
        Returns:
        A collection of all bank structures that pass the filter provided by the event
